alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 7:03AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mostly light snow this afternoon with strong winds. Heavy snow will redevelop tonight and continue into Sunday afternoon. Storm totals 5 to 10 inches are expected through Sunday, with local amounts to 12 inches possible near Gould, Grand Lake, and in the Fraser River Valley. Additional snow is expected on Monday. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Chain and traction laws, as well as road closures, will possibly be enacted for the mountains.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
